pages.text: $(li)The Moth Dust is a special ingredient that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/infernal_expansion/luminance)Potion of Luminance$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/infernalexp/glowsilk)Glowsilk$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/glowsilk_moth)Glowsilk Moths$(/l) may drop this item on death.
